title: Spanish style oxtail stew
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '1.8kg oxtail, cut into pieces', '2 onions, chopped', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '2 green peppers, chopped', '1 litre dry white wine', '250ml beef stock', '30g plain chocolate (at least 70 per cent cocoa solids)', '3 bay leaves', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons paprika', '2 carrots, thickly sliced']
